mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, BOARD.* FROM ( SELECT p.PARENT_POST_NUMBER, p.PARENT_POST_TITLE, p.PARENT_NUMBER, p.PARENT_POST_REGISTER_DATE, p1.PARENT_NICKNAME, p1.PARENT_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL FROM parent_post p JOIN PARENT P1 ON p.PARENT_NUMBER = p1.PARENT_NUMBER ORDER BY p.PARENT_POST_REGISTER_DATE DESC ) BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rn > #{startRow}
mapper.insert: insert into parent_post values(#{parentPostNumber}, #{parentPostTitle}, #{parentPostContent}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{parentNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PARENT_POST_NUMBER, P.PARENT_POST_TITLE, P.PARENT_POST_CONTENT, U.PARENT_NICKNAME, U.PARENT_NUMBER, P.PARENT_POST_VIEWS, P.PARENT_POST_REGISTER_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARENT_FILE PF WHERE PF.PARENT_POST_NUMBER = P.PARENT_POST_NUMBER) AS FILE_COUNT FROM PARENT_POST P JOIN PARENT U ON U.PARENT_NUMBER = P.PARENT_NUMBER where p.PARENT_POST_NUMBER = #{parentPostNumber}
